alert.note: Alert for Banks; Dawson; Forsyth; Hall (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 12:47PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Forsyth, northwestern Banks, southeastern Dawson and Hall Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1247 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over War Hill Park, or near Gainesville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Homer, Oakwood, Lula, Clermont, Gillsville, Murrayville, Oscarville, Hollingsworth, War Hill Park, and Chestatee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
